nodes.text: The Poraskors were a group from Betal, a planet located in Wild Space. General Airen Cracken heard rumors that the Poraskors hand-wove the neural-web reflex threads used in Response iMprOVEMENT Packages.

The Poraskors were created by Christopher Kubasik for Cracken's Rebel Field Guide, a sourcebook for West End Games' Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game. Published in 1991, the book did not identify whether the Poraskors were a species, culture or group.
